__e: You know, at least Clarke was saving her own people.
David Clarke knew exactly what he was doing.
Amanda Clarke had something to do with what happened on that beach.
The truth is... I have no idea who Amanda Clarke is anymore.
Please tell me you know where Clarke is.
I heard the news last year when it came out that Charlotte's David Clarke's daughter.
We've all got a monster inside of us, Clarke, and we're all responsible for what it does when we let it out.
In order for any of this to make sense, I need to start at the beginning... With David Clarke and what we did to him and his innocent baby girl.
Just tell us where Clarke and the others are hiding.
